content.detailedDescription: 3 odd rainbows appeared around and below sun while in kenosha, wisconsin, took picture with smart phone and observed the object. happened awhile back over lake michigan. same thing, odd rainbows with the same objects. that it was my camera. but i've taken pics of sun without getting the results i get with the odd rainbows.
content.summary: Blue sphere with white dots.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving when i saw the ufo over homedepo  i started to take picturers but then they disappeared i only managed to take a photo of about four of them
content.summary: Round metallic ball

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright red light that blinked twice then went out of view.  i walked in its direction to get it in view again and noticed a cylindrical object slowly ascending.  the object emitted no light but appeared dimly visible from surrounding reflected light.  the object faded out of view within a few seconds.
content.summary: Saw 2 red blinking lights then a dark gray cylindrical object

content.detailedDescription:
I was trying to capture lighting strikes with my iphone 5s using burst mode. 
it was only moments later that i noticed the object in the photos. at first i thought it was the beginning of a lightning strike until i noticed the object moving as i scrolled through the photos. the object appears to move from left to right at a high rate of speed. there were big cumulus clouds in the sky and a lighting storm going on at the time. i estimate the object to be 1 to 3 miles away. as you can see in the photos there are stationary objects in the back ground to compare the movement to, i was about 40 feet away from the street lights in the back ground and the lights are about 50 feet apart. as the object abruptly stops and changes direction it appears get taller or even have something pop up from the top of it or out of the dome. when moving it appears to get smaller or flatter and the protruding top seems to go back down. it looks almost like a box at times but this may be because of the way it is illuminated in different sections. i would say it is probably dome or saucer shaped. upon seeing the object on my phone i knew this was something that exceeded the technology that we currently supposedly have and was happy to have captured it on photo. the photos i have provide are from the burst on my iphone camera. i have more and i uploaded these to my laptop then a memory stick so some of the time stamps may be off but i have the original photos and burst still on my phone unaltered. these were taken at a place of business that's why i didn't give a physical address. i would be happy to give more information if that would help though. i also made a video of the burst photos using the app imgplay just for easier viewing.Hope to hear from you soon.
content.summary: Ufo goes  left to right at high rate of speed several times.

content.detailedDescription: The object was huge and hovering over the nfta train station. i could clearly see it glowing in the sky , we get a lot of small phenomenon on the street but this was highly unusaly. i have never seen that color red in the sky before. i had small burst of happiness from it but overall it didn't effect me. i went in my friends house and when i came out it was gone.
content.summary: As i was walking to my friends house i observed a huge red sun floating above the train station. i have never seen anything like it , it was perfectly round. i felt slightly confused and dazed . it was soundless

content.detailedDescription: Walking down the the beach from bluff point rd. i looked up from my phone to see the 2 lights out above the water just hovering. maybe 30-40 feet above the water. i stopped dead in my tracks and just watched them hover around each other for about a min. then both orbs sank into the water as if there were no water there. and instantly the lights went out. i didn't turn my back to the ocean as i waited to try and see them again. but when i tried to move i couldn't feel my legs and my heart was beating out of my chest. i walked back to my house further up bluff point rd. without turning my back to the ocean, mostly from fear.
content.summary: 2 tandem ball of lights. orbiting around each other, then sinking into the water in the bay area.

content.detailedDescription: On thursday august 18 at approximately 11:15 pm i looked out my bedroom window and saw a large orange-red object in the sky.  it was in northwest london.  it was hovering just above the tree line. my first reaction was that it looked like a boxy lighted chinese lantern.  it wasn't moving, just hovering.  fairly large, with pulsating lights around it that sort of formed a triangle.  i called to my mom and brother to come and see it.  we went out on the balcony to see if we could see it from the outside.  we couldn't. i went back to the bedroom and my brother called and said he could now see it from the balcony.  seeing it from the balcony it now looked more like an oval shape...But still similar to a lighted chinese lantern and the pulsating lights were gone.  my brother said he could see flickering lights around it as it came into his view on the balcony.  we both watched it for about a minute trying to figure out what it was.  it was higher in the sky now and it was travelling northwest to northeast on a steady path and i grabbed my phone and said i was going to take a picture then all of a sudden it dimmed  and disappeared as if something in the sky opened to let it in. my first thought was that it didn't want me to take its picture. i have never seen anything like it in my life nor has my brother.  we were amazed.!!!
content.summary: Red-orange object in sky above northwest london then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on the east ridge road. by westfield i witnessed a greenish orb come down from the sky into the trees off to my right. a mile at most away. not sure of the size. my wife and i both witnessed it. no sound. i think it landed in the woods.
content.summary: Greenish orb of light feel into trees. had a sort of triangular bottom. to my left. i was driving. it dive into the trees to my right

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend where drivig home from our vacation trip
my gifriend was driving the the car and i took pictures out of the open window on the passenger seat, just random pictures and when i got home and looked at the pictures i notice the objects when i zoomed in i was amazed that i captured those things i can't say for sure what they are hope you guys can analyse them they are 100% real just zoomed in took the pictures with my galaxy  note 4
hope you guys can figure it out
would be really apreciated to hear from you over my email address
content.summary: Random pictures from passenger car seat window was completely open 100% real

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home from relatives it was evening sky was a deep blue
i saw a black object in the sky boy did it stand out i checked my digital watch but it turned off and i only bought it yesterday as i looked at it it slowly turned white the hovered and shot off into the distance boy was i freaked out cos i was only five
content.summary: Like a metor but it stop in mid air before it changed direction

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the us 101 north with two other people in the car (not witnesses) when all of a sudden in the distance around the same height as the low clouds in the sky (30 min before sunset) i spotted a translucent object moving quite fast in the sky. because i was driving, i did not take out my phone in an attempt to capture an image but i tried pointing it out to the other two passengers in the car. by that time, the object had gone from a background of sky to a background of mountains and it was lost in the changing scenery. i followed it with my eyes for approximately 45 seconds because i had to look away and when i looked back i had lost it. i tried explaining it as a sky jellyfish to my friends. it was the bell-shape of a jellyfish sans tentacles. it was also translucent like a jellyfish. you could see the mountains behind it but it was clearly not a cloud or anything man-made. i would compare it to looking through a bubble floating in the sky. the bottom was slightly wavy, not a straight line but the top was a clear curve. i had first noticed it when i was scanning the horizon for traffic. it was moving at a steady pace across the sky in an eastward direction and i looked around for airplanes when i saw the object. i saw 1, and the airplane was minuscule in comparison and clearly solid. this object was also 3d, but like i said it was translucent. i was speechless when i saw it. i have seen lights in the sky in the past and technically i couldn't identify them, but i could imagine they were a satellite or fireball. this was like nothing i have ever seen before and i'm clearly at a loss of words to describe it. i wish i had asked my passengers to try to take a photo or see it with their own eyes but it was lost in the mountains by the time i could articulate my thoughts. i can imagine that it would be hard to see if you hadn't spotted it and followed it. it was nothing with a solid color or bright light that attracted attention. it was trying to blend in with the scenery but had some sort of electromagnetic field around it that made it visible to the naked eye.
content.summary: Translucent "sky jellyfish" moving much faster than clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work the grave shift and noticed lights that were never there the 5years i've taken the road to work. i freaked out and when i pulled my phone out to record, i couldn't see it because of the tree line. when i saw it again i began to record. when i got to the next town, i called the police station and asked if there were any reports on lights in the sky and he informed me that it wasn't and i was the first one to call. i was too embarrassed to give my name because i didn't want people to think i was crazy. i'm still lost for words.
content.summary: 3 lights in a semi circle and it looked as if it was carrying something

content.detailedDescription: Whilst watching a tvs documentary on sean beans waterloo episode 2 , just after a cavalry man cuts a pig carcass with a sword , the camera was panned out and i noticed a object flash through the shot , it caught my eye so took film back and paused screen i was able to , take back the film to when then object came from behind a large building and flew overhead it's really clear to see a square or rectangular ufo i'll call it it daylight , totally amazing it's not a drone it was travelling to fast on look back a secound object can also be seen of to the right but at a further distance away again black in colour . with technology available if you see the shot and edit it you may get some great detail . i took a few screen shots but you can get it on film if you check out the footage filmed on the documentary
content.summary: Spotted whilst watching documentary, sean beans waterloo episode 2

content.detailedDescription: I was out looking for satellites and i was watching this one it looks like a star at first it was moving from west to east and stopped above me then the light goes real bright and stayed that way for maybe 20 seconds  it was like someone turn a  spotlight on it kept traveling east a few seconds they made a hard right angle turn then blinked out there wet no blinking lights i don't beleave it was a aircraft.
content.summary: I was  watching satellites and watch what i thought was a satellite but then it was like someone put the headlights of a car on bright

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on back porch texting someone, with my phone. looked up and seen disc shaped craft moving from north to south with out sound. glowing or reflecting light, light blue in color. i tried to get my phone camera on to take a photo, as craft went behind a tree, when camera came up, craft was gone.
content.summary: Disc shaped craft moving north to south, without sound, light blue in color

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to smoke at aprox 10:05 pm est was looking up at the night sky and saw two bright blue flashing lights about 200 300 ft above the homes across the street from my house moving at a very quick pace. at first thought it was a small plane, but realized there was no sound. i watched it travel from the southwest to northeast. i then noted the blue lights slowed and craft slowed as well and came to a complete stop! no plane can do that! the blue lights went out, at least that what i thought, but realized the craft was turning around and the blue lights were in the back. as it turned i now saw 2 bright white and one red light. it then shot straight up about another 100 - 200 ft and started heading back the way it came toward the southwest. as it passed me i could make out the shape and could see the blue lights flashing again. i noted the the craft was not moving as fast and the lights we not flashing as fast as they were when i first saw it. i watched it travel in a straight line about 600 or 700 ft off the ground for about 25-35 secs before it was out of sight.  
this was no airplane. as i'm former air force, and for sure was not a copter.. it was larger than a car or truck, but not by much. very sleek and the back sloped down where the 2 beautiful blue lights were located, if these were light and not some type of propulsion the only reason i say this is because the speed of the lights flashing were consistant with the speed of the craft. so cool, i know this was not a star, or planet or some secret military craft. this thing moved way to easy, stopped, hovered, turned in place, shot straight up and changed speed.
no i have not been drinking or doing any drugs.. 
hope someone else reports this ufo.  
red lion, pa 
so cool.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue flashing, stopped, hovered, shot straight up. changed direction on a dime

content.detailedDescription: My window has a view to the air space of newark airport in nj. i always what the airplanes landing and taking off when i'm in my living room. on august 17th at 7:20pm, i was surprised when i saw initially 2 (i though were airplanes) objects fling close to each other. they were high enough in the sky not to affect the airport traffic, but i could see they were flying relatively close to each other, so i wonder what they were. i know airplanes don't fly together like that. i took my phone and zoomed to take a picture and what a surprise when i notice a 3rd object on my picture. they were in triangle formation, but the third one was kind of far.I watch them crossing the sky for about 5 min. they were shine like a star and reflective. i stared all the time i could trying to see something that could indicate they were airplanes, but as they move to another angle, i still seeing three bright objects like a star. i didn't see any wings.
content.summary: It looked like three stars in the sky flying in triangle formation far from each other in same speed. only one had left a trail

content.detailedDescription: On friday august 19th about 12:10 in the afternoon, while spotting airplanes via my binoculars, (i hobby watching aircraft utilizing flight radar 24) i was watching a delta flight flying from northeast direction when just above it a stationary object, perfectly round and golf ball like, caught my attention. thinking of course it was just another aircraft i checked my ipad radar and it was not on it. i looked again and realized it really was just hovering high in the air. going from the altitude of the delta flight i ascertain the object to have been 40,000 or more feet up. the object then started to slowly drift to the sourheast in the same contrail direction of the delta, and then it abruptly shot to its upper left direction and subsequently vanished. the entire episode was little under a minute, but it s something i'll never forget. i can only say that in the purest sense of the acronym, this object truly was, for me at least, an unidentifiable object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very round golf ball shape, seemed solid white, very high roughly 40,000 feet, saw through binos

content.detailedDescription: Friends and i were driving home from work on i81 southbound. we came around a bend and noticed to the left of the destiny mall and in the horizon a metallic craft with 4 bright white lights rotating in the middle. the upper and lower parts of the craft were black, like what heated metal looks like. the middle had a row of 4 large white lights. the lights were lit but from the center of each light it would get bright white and expand outward. then the light next to it to the right would do the same thing and the previous light would go back to just being lit. and it would continue until it reached the light on the far right and after the light on the right would go back to just being lit, there was a pause and it would start from the far left again. this continued through out  the sighting. the lights were so big that a passenger plane would have easily fit into each of them. when we came over the bridge it had gone more than approximately 30 miles in an instant. now it was no longer to the right of us, it was directly in front of us in the distance. while it was hovering in the distance, it created a funnel cloud from directly underneath, from what i can only assume was due to its spinning but you could not see its base spinning, to the ground. we got off the exit on  spencer street. we turned left, now object was on the right of us again. looking at the object in the distance, it was slightly to the right and far behind the money towers. even at its distance it was as tall as 2 stories of the building. we sat there for a few minutes and observed it, drove east on spencer street until we reached n. state street. we turned right and headed south and the object was now in front of us but slightly to the right. we sat there and watched it some more until it disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Large metallic craft 4 bright white lights middle hovered took off stopped on a dime and hovered again

content.detailedDescription:
I and my younger brother were walking to safeway and we left the house around 6:50pm and went to the dollar store and pick up snacks and walk we made it to 20th and grove which has no lights the street is dark before the light there were a black helicopter couple mins after me and my brother turn around because something told us to turn we did we see nothing but we saw a white light look like a star then i realize a blue glow after i don't remember anything after 2 hours of time walk back home and my mom told that we were missing for two hours and she checks stores and no one saw us .
just isn't time something like this happens in 9th grade i fell asleep at and a feeling to wake a walk to the 2nd-floor bathroom i remember lights but nun else i remember waking up in the morning super tried and remembers the light in the night sky 

with the safeway incident  weeks after it, i keep having dreams of a human looking being it was female green eyes long hair silver hair warns about different stuff on world and how be peacekeeper combat what other look like what the government going wrong and feeds knowledge she tells in dreams that they pick because i want to be peacekeeper and because it spiritual its not bad experience i don't know if its real or not
content.summary: Bright light white and look like blue mixed

content.detailedDescription: First time happen in georgia very eary in the morning where it was still dark outside i was in the car and seen these balls of light moving around that i took a picture of and then completely forgot until later going through my picture one day and seen it. then it kinda refrshed my memory. the second time i was in florida on my way home about 1 am and it was pitch black i seen four balls od light floating a few feet a head of me they stood there for a min i was able to capture a picture again befire the few straight up and disappeared. it waa strange cause i remeber the feeling that i was about to see something before the lights appeared it was like i was prepared with my phone in my hand to tale the picutre. i also forgot about this incident until tje same day i was looking throught my pics when i noticed rhe first one as well.
content.summary: Seen a few balls of light that i actually got pictures of then they took off

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the mall on coolidge from long lake. i saw what i thought was a blimp. it is woodward cruise so that seemed normal. as i started to drive closer i slowly moved north. i thought wow..That's not a blimp. it looked like t was covered in windows but it was all a weird orange..Peach color but there was not light emulating from it. as i drove closer it went north so i couldn't see it from the tree line. by the time i could see, it was gone. this entire event was 30 secs long. i looked all over for a plane, blimp. nothing. it was creepy how it just disappeared once i got by the tree line, again, all within. 30 second time span. i was traveling with other cars. i noticed no one was breaking. i nearly sopped in the middle of coolidge! then once i got into the mall i felt like a crazy person. i say i my car feeling like i knew i just saw a ufo. but i'm totally normal so...It couldn't have been. so  i decided to report it tight away in case anyone else saw it and also things they may be double thinking what they saw. totally weird.
content.summary: I was driving to the mall and saw a dull looking peachy orange long oval thing floating and slowing moving north. it was right in front of traffic but it's like no one stopped to watch..I don't think they noticed then it moved northand disappeared in air

content.detailedDescription:
This took placed on pom pom island in the okavango delta where i was on vacation.
the night sky was totally clear without noticeable wind blowing. at approximately 2200 hours i noticed a white, sphere or oval shape object moving from the right to the left in the sky. i thought it odd since the object pulsated approx every 3 seconds. it moved in a descending pattern until it abruptly dropped right down toward the delta itself. it continued to pulse. i was trying to figure out what it could be.
i did not see it again until approx 4 seconds later i saw a blazing white light appear above a tree line directly in front of me in the water in the delta. the animal sounds i normally hear at that time ceased. there was no hippo, no baboon, no vervet monkey sounds.
i figure this had to be same light as it continued to pulse. i could not see the actually object itself. it is pitch black in the delta. there are no lights. at night there is nothing out there. no planes, no helicopters, nothing. there was dead silence as this light continued to pulse every 3 seconds. it was stationary above the tree line. 
i am not given to imagination, flights of fancy. i have never had this happen before. i kept watching this light but i felt increasingly uncomfortable though i don't know why.
i knew this was unusual. i was watching from a deck. i was staying in a tent on the island. there are 6 tents in the camp. the tents are well spaced apart. there is nothing but grass, water and trees in the delta along with wild animals.
my camera was inside my tent on my bed. sounds stupid but i couldn't think straight. i felt dopey and uncomfortable. i watched this pulsing light for approx 8 minutes. i was fixated on it trying to figure it out.
i suddenly thought i should just go to bed and did. while preparing to get into bed i could still see the pulsation from the mesh like covering in the front of the tent. the next day i thought, "what the hell happened?
i realized it was especially weird because i did not think to take a video of this with my camera. its not like me to not do this. 
i am submitting a photo of the view directly outside the tent where i was staying. the light was above the trees you can see in the photo that are dead center. if anyone can help me understand what i saw i would appreciate it. in between the pulsation it was black.
content.summary: A pulsating light that descended and apparently became stationary over a tree line

content.detailedDescription: It was late in the morning on may 26, 2014 and i was in my upstairs living room when i happened to glance out my window. i noticed a white and grey angular object fly silently by in front of the trees in a straight line, coming from the direction of some power lines. it was a little bigger than a basketball and shaped like a star. it had no wings, propellers or any kind of propulsion that i could see. i was stunned by the sight but did not feel threatened. it flew quickly out of sight and i did not have time to grab my camera. i did not tell the neighbors because i didnt think that they would understand. they would say that i was crazy.
content.summary: Late one morning i saw an angular, star shaped ufo fly silently past my window.

content.detailedDescription: It was in the early evening on april first, 2013 and i was in my upstairs living room drinking a coke when i heard what sounded like an airplane outside the window. i got up and looked out the window and saw a black, bullet shaped object with a rectangular, orange, glowing tailpipe flying in a straight line in front of the trees. it had no wings or propellers. it was  a little bigger than a basketball. there are power lines near my house and it came from that direction. i was stunned and curious but i did not feel threatened. it flew by too quickly for me to get my camera and soon it flew out of sight. i did not tell the neighbors about it because i thought they would not understand. they would call me crazy. roughly a year later i saw another small ufo fly past the same window. it was shaped differently and i will fill out a separate report for it. i did see a mysterious helicopter hovering next to the power lines across the street sometime before i saw the first ufo. i waved at the pilot. he did not wave back.
content.summary: I saw a bullet shaped ufo with a glowing, orange tailpipe fly past my window

content.detailedDescription: I just saw this bright ball of light in the sky moving in a straight line. it was not flashing or blinking. then when it got near the moon, it disappeared and i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: I just saw a bright flash and then i saw this ball of light moving in a straight line. i have seen these before but now i have a video.

content.detailedDescription: i took my phone apple 5s and i start recording a rainbow really strange rainbow and got my attention because they have a black line in the center when i start recording i notice something appears in front of the rainbow i trying to follow it but was too fast and disappear to norwest when i check the video  i realize was a ufo not a drone  because the way they move is different is nothing they can move so fast or radically or change position that fast and this is the third time i was 12 years old in peru i saw the biggest one in three months ago i was in key west and also another one in top of the pool and disappear in the flasher the eye   he went to straight up to the sky
content.summary: Very fast object

content.detailedDescription: My wife, daughter, and i were flying from ft.Lauderdale fl to houston tx yesterday. during the flight i took many pictures of the cloud formations out of the window. after reviewing the pictures, in 7 pictures taken in rapid succession i noticed a green ball of light in the lower left area. i did not see the ball when taking the pictures. it does not show up in any other of the 50 photos taken throughout the trip in the same way. ???
content.summary: Noticed after taking pictures on plane orb was in a series

content.detailedDescription: I just saw this bright ball of light in the sky moving in a straight line. it was not flashing or blinking. then when it got near the moon, it disappeared and i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: I just saw a bright flash and then i saw this ball of light moving in a straight line. i have seen these before but now i have a video.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw this bright ball of light in the sky moving in a straight line. it was not flashing or blinking. then when it got near the moon, it disappeared and i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: I just saw a bright flash and then i saw this ball of light moving in a straight line. i have seen these before but now i have a video.
